channel.title: Absinthe on Need a drink?
channel.description: Recent content in Absinthe on Need a drink?

item.title: Corpse reviver no. 2
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 20 ml gin
  • 20 ml triple sec
  • 20 ml Lillet Blanc
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 4 dashes absinthe
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. (Optional) rinse glass with absinthe.
  2. Shake ingredients.
  3. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  4. Garnish with a cocktail cherry.

item.title: La Louisiane
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rye whiskey
  • 20 ml sweet vermouth
  • 20 ml Bénédictine liqueur
  • 3 dashes absinthe
  • 3 dashes creole bitters
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. Stirred.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with a cocktail cherry.

item.title: Sazerac
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rye whisky
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 4 dashes creole bitters
  • 4 dashes absinthe
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. (Optional) rinse glass with absinthe.
  2. Stirred.
  3. Serve in a rocks glass without ice.
  4. Garnish with a lemon twist.
